content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill and wooden chest at (-28, -61)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Secondary Mining Operation at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill and wooden chest at (-18, -53)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Operation at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (fluid systems 11589, 11591)
- Electric network connecting various entities (id 15279)

### Science Pack Production Line
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5) producing automation science packs
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Extraction Errors
- Cannot extract items from chests that don't contain the requested items
- Verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to fuel entities
- Keep track of coal inventory and refuel before running out

### Production Line Issues
- Assembling machine missing resources (copper plates and iron gear wheels)
- Ensure consistent supply of materials to assembling machine input chest

### Entity Status Issues
- Multiple inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure proper material flow through the production chain
- Verify correct placement and configuration of inserters relative to source/destination entities

### Furnace Operation Issues
- Multiple furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt"
- Ensure proper material supply chain to furnaces
